titleInfo.title: Research Data for submission: Optimal integration of actions and their visual effects: exploring the time window for multisensory causal inference

mods.abstract: These are the raw data collected for and analyzed in the submitted manuscript: "Optimal integration of actions and their visual effects: exploring the time window for multisensory causal inference."
